snippet: The law school that gave former President Jimmy Carter the award is part of Yeshiva University, and some students said an Orthodox Jewish university should not honor a critic of Israel.
abstract: Ceremony at Benjamin N Cardozo Law School in Greenwich Village to give International Advocate for Peace award to former Pres Jimmy Carter takes place without incident, despite some assertions that critic of Israel should not be honored at Orthodox Jewish university.
lead_paragraph: The law school that gave former President Jimmy Carter the award is part of Yeshiva University, and some students said an Orthodox Jewish university should not honor a critic of Israel.

headline.seo: Carter Accepts Peace Award That Drew Criticism
headline.main: Carter Gets Peace Award at Law School, Despite Criticism
headline.print_headline: Carter Gets Peace Award at Law School, Despite Criticism

keywords.value: Cardozo, Benjamin N, School of Law at Yeshiva University
keywords.name: organizations
